function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High-density urban housing does not offer restorative experiences for residents","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased amount of time spent indoors due to pandemic-related city shutdowns","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on occupant wellbeing and health in residential design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Study may not apply to future effectiveness of npis in the region","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Changes in the covid-19 epidemic in saudi arabia since the study period","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Systematic under-reporting of deaths leading to inaccurate seroprevalence estimates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider the influence of other behaviors on disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the practical impact of npis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Complex interactions of interventions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limitations in data representation and assumptions","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncontrolled sars-cov-2 transmission with a basic reproductive number close to 2 across regions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Considerable uncertainty in estimates of intervention effectiveness, particularly for school closures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Large uncertainty in transmission reductions during relaxation phases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneity in transmission reduction among regions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Temporal changes in the effective reproduction number r eff due to varying npi effectiveness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in the effectiveness of npi combinations between intervention periods and regions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous transmission reduction during curfew npis across regions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wide range of basic reproductive number estimates across different regions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using a modeling framework to estimate region-specific parameters for epidemic seeding dates, basic reproduction number, and npi effectiveness may lead to inaccuracies in the estimation of these parameters and their impact on epidemic trajectories.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inference on model parameters for spatial locations based on covid-19 transmission dynamics may lead to biased or oversimplified conclusions about disease transmission in different geographical areas.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of aggregated observation and simulated variables over longer time periods for model calibration may overlook short-term fluctuations and dynamics in disease transmission, leading to limited accuracy in capturing real-time epidemic trends.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Model simulates infection dynamics based on sars-cov-2 parameter estimates, without considering age stratification.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population-level mobility fluxes obtained from facebook data for good may raise privacy and ethical concerns.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public and private gatherings with reduced capacity and physical distancing measures.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Domestic travel ban to prevent the spread of the virus between regions.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Imposition of curfews to limit movement and reduce person-to-person contact during peak transmission times.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete or delayed implementation of npis in specific regions of saudi arabia.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of public compliance with npis such as isolation, testing, and school closures.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited research on sars-cov-2 dynamics in gulf states and saudi arabia","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited studies on non-pharmaceutical intervention npi effectiveness in gulf states","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Community transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imported covid-19 cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of religious pilgrimage and closure of public venues","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality in healthcare buildings and hospitals","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low performance of domestic hot water systems in healthcare buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underreporting of impacts related to bacs design and automation levels in healthcare buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak leading to increased pressure on healthcare system and staff","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper indoor air quality and thermal comfort in healthcare buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in ventilation system installations","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased focus on indoor air quality","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of assessment for water usage and its impact on health in building evaluation tool","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low flexibility and storage in hospitals due to domestic hot water, needing more focus.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Legislative constraint of water storage due to legionella bacteria.","category":"Legal
